item.title: How to Set up a GPU-powered Deep Learning Development Environment on Google Cloud
item.description: Introduction Unlike most deep learning courses that teach you the core concepts based on toy examples, the course I’ve been taking recently, Deep Learning Fundametals, gets you hands-on with the latest open-source tools for training real-world deep learning models. While this sounds exciting, it does demand more than the conventional Google Colab / Macbook development environments can offer â€“ without some serious GPU power, it takes forever to train a ResNet-50 from scratch or fine tune all parameters of a DistilBert model.
